property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
WITH "CTE_MATERIAL_MASTER" AS (
    SELECT
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemBasePEOInventoryItemId"         AS "INVENTORY_ITEM_ID",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemBasePEOInventoryOrganizationId" AS "ORGANIZATION_ID",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemBasePEOCreationDate"            AS "CREATION_DATE",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemBasePEOBomItemType"             AS "BOM_ITEM_TYPE",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemBasePEOItemCatalogGroupId"      AS "ITEM_CATALOG_GROUP_ID",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemBasePEOPrimaryUomCode"          AS "PRIMARY_UOM_CODE",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemBasePEOItemNumber"              AS "SEGMENT1",
        "ITEM_CATALOG"."CatalogTranslationPEOCategorySetName"     AS "ITEM_CATALOG_NAME",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemTranslationPEODescription"      AS "DESCRIPTION",
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY
                "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemBasePEOInventoryItemId"
            ORDER BY
                "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemBasePEOCreationDate"
        ) AS "RN"
    FROM "FscmTopModelAM_ScmExtractAM_EgpBiccExtractAM_ItemExtractPVO" AS "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"
        LEFT JOIN "FscmTopModelAM_EgpItemsPublicModelAM_ItemCategory" AS "ITEM_CATEGORY"
            ON "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemBasePEOInventoryItemId" = "ITEM_CATEGORY"."InventoryItemId"
            AND "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemBasePEOInventoryOrganizationId" = "ITEM_CATEGORY"."OrganizationId"
        LEFT JOIN "FscmTopModelAM_ScmExtractAM_EgpBiccExtractAM_CatalogExtractPVO" AS "ITEM_CATALOG"
            ON "ITEM_CATEGORY"."CatalogBasePEOCategorySetId" = "ITEM_CATALOG"."CatalogBasePEOCategorySetId"
    WHERE EXISTS (
            SELECT
                1
            FROM "FscmTopModelAM_ScmExtractAM_ScmRcsBiccExtractAM_InvOrgParametersExtractPVO" AS "MTL_PARAMETERS"
            WHERE "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ItemBasePEOInventoryOrganizationId" = "MTL_PARAMETERS"."OrganizationId"
        )
)
SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "MATERIAL_MASTER"."INVENTORY_ITEM_ID"        AS "ID",
    CAST("MATERIAL_MASTER"."ITEM_CATALOG_NAME" AS VARCHAR(255))               AS "MaterialGroupName",
    CAST("MATERIAL_MASTER"."ITEM_CATALOG_GROUP_ID" AS VARCHAR(255))           AS "MaterialGroupNumber",
    "MATERIAL_MASTER"."DESCRIPTION"                                           AS "MaterialName",
    <%=sourceSystem%>                                                         AS "SourceSystemInstance",
    "MATERIAL_MASTER"."PRIMARY_UOM_CODE"                                      AS "StockKeepingUnit",
    CAST("MATERIAL_MASTER"."SEGMENT1" AS VARCHAR(255))                        AS "MaterialNumber"
FROM "CTE_MATERIAL_MASTER" AS "MATERIAL_MASTER"
WHERE "MATERIAL_MASTER"."RN" = 1

SELECT <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "MARA"."MANDT" || '::' || "MARA"."MATNR" AS "ID",
    "MAKT"."MAKTX"                                                           AS "MaterialName",
    "MARA"."MATKL"                                                           AS "MaterialGroupNumber",
    "T023T"."WGBEZ"                                                          AS "MaterialGroupName",
    "MARA"."MATNR"                                                           AS "MaterialNumber",
    CASE
        WHEN "T006"."DIMID" != 'AAAADL'
            THEN "T006D"."MSSIE"
        WHEN "T006"."DIMID" = 'AAAADL'
            THEN "MARM"."MEINH"
    END                                                                      AS "StockKeepingUnit",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "MARA"."MANDT"                              AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "MARA" AS "MARA"
         LEFT JOIN "MAKT" AS "MAKT"
                   ON "MARA"."MANDT" = "MAKT"."MANDT"
                       AND "MARA"."MATNR" = "MAKT"."MATNR"
                       AND "MAKT"."SPRAS" = <%=LanguageKey%> 
         LEFT JOIN "T023T" AS "T023T"
                   ON "MARA"."MANDT" = "T023T"."MANDT"
                       AND "MARA"."MATKL" = "T023T"."MATKL"
                       AND "T023T"."SPRAS" = <%=LanguageKey%> 
         LEFT JOIN "T006" AS "T006"
                   ON "MARA"."MANDT" = "T006"."MANDT"
                       AND "MARA"."MEINS" = "T006"."MSEHI"
         LEFT JOIN "T006D" AS "T006D"
                   ON "T006"."MANDT" = "T006D"."MANDT"
                       AND "T006"."DIMID" = "T006D"."DIMID"
         LEFT JOIN "MARM" AS "MARM"
                   ON "MARA"."MANDT" = "MARM"."MANDT"
                       AND "MARA"."MATNR" = "MARM"."MATNR"
                       AND "MARM"."MEINH" = <%=SI-Unit%>

SELECT
	<%=sourceSystem%>||'::'||"ReleasedProducts"."ItemNumber"            AS "ID",
    "ProductGroups"."GroupId"                                           AS "MaterialGroupName",
    "ReleasedProducts"."ProductSearchName"                              AS "MaterialName",
    "ReleasedProducts"."ItemNumber"                                     AS "MaterialNumber",
    "ProductCategoryAssignments"."ProductCategoryName"                  AS "ProductHierarchy",
    <%=sourceSystem%> ||'::'||"ReleasedProducts"."dataAreaId"           AS "SourceSystemInstance",
    NULL                                                                AS StockKeepingUnit,
    NULL                                                                AS MaterialGroupNumber
FROM "ReleasedProductsV2" AS ReleasedProducts
	LEFT JOIN "ProductCategoryAssignments"
	    ON "ProductCategoryAssignments"."ProductNumber" = "ReleasedProducts"."ProductNumber"
    LEFT JOIN "ProductGroups"
        ON "ProductGroups".dataAreaId = ReleasedProducts.dataAreaId
        AND "ProductGroups".GroupId = ReleasedProducts.ProductGroupId

display_name: Material - 00. SAP S/4 HANA Extraction Pool_S4H-HANA

property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "MARA"."MANDT" || '::' || "MARA"."MATNR" AS "ID",
    "MAKT"."MAKTX"                                                           AS "MaterialName",
    "MARA"."MATKL"                                                           AS "MaterialGroupNumber",
    "T023T"."WGBEZ"                                                          AS "MaterialGroupName",
    "MARA"."MATNR"                                                           AS "MaterialNumber",
    CASE
        WHEN "T006"."DIMID" != 'AAAADL'
            THEN "T006D"."MSSIE"
        WHEN "T006"."DIMID" = 'AAAADL'
            THEN "MARM"."MEINH"
    END                                                                      AS "StockKeepingUnit",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "MARA"."MANDT"                              AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "MARA" AS "MARA"
         LEFT JOIN "MAKT" AS "MAKT"
                   ON "MARA"."MANDT" = "MAKT"."MANDT"
                       AND "MARA"."MATNR" = "MAKT"."MATNR"
                       AND "MAKT"."SPRAS" = <%=LanguageKey%> 
         LEFT JOIN "T023T" AS "T023T"
                   ON "MARA"."MANDT" = "T023T"."MANDT"
                       AND "MARA"."MATKL" = "T023T"."MATKL"
                       AND "T023T"."SPRAS" = <%=LanguageKey%> 
         LEFT JOIN "T006" AS "T006"
                   ON "MARA"."MANDT" = "T006"."MANDT"
                       AND "MARA"."MEINS" = "T006"."MSEHI"
         LEFT JOIN "T006D" AS "T006D"
                   ON "T006"."MANDT" = "T006D"."MANDT"
                       AND "T006"."DIMID" = "T006D"."DIMID"
         LEFT JOIN "MARM" AS "MARM"
                   ON "MARA"."MANDT" = "MARM"."MANDT"
                       AND "MARA"."MATNR" = "MARM"."MATNR"
                       AND "MARM"."MEINH" = <%=SI-Unit%>

WITH "CTE_MATERIAL_MASTER" AS (
    SELECT
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."INVENTORY_ITEM_ID"        AS "INVENTORY_ITEM_ID",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ORGANIZATION_ID"          AS "ORGANIZATION_ID",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."CREATION_DATE"            AS "CREATION_DATE",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."DESCRIPTION"              AS "DESCRIPTION",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."BOM_ITEM_TYPE"            AS "BOM_ITEM_TYPE",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ITEM_CATALOG_GROUP_ID"    AS "ITEM_CATALOG_GROUP_ID",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."PRIMARY_UOM_CODE"         AS "PRIMARY_UOM_CODE",
        "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."SEGMENT1"                 AS "SEGMENT1",
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY
                "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."INVENTORY_ITEM_ID"
            ORDER BY
                "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."CREATION_DATE"
        ) AS "RN"
    FROM "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B" AS "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"
    WHERE EXISTS (
            SELECT
                1
            FROM
                "MTL_PARAMETERS" AS "MTL_PARAMETERS"
            WHERE
                "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ORGANIZATION_ID" = "MTL_PARAMETERS"."MASTER_ORGANIZATION_ID"
        )
)
SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "MATERIAL_MASTER"."INVENTORY_ITEM_ID" AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%>                                                  AS "SourceSystemInstance",
    "MATERIAL_MASTER"."DESCRIPTION"                                    AS "MaterialName",
    CAST("MATERIAL_MASTER"."ITEM_CATALOG_GROUP_ID" AS VARCHAR(255))    AS "MaterialGroupNumber",
    "MTL_ITEM_CATALOG_GROUPS_TL"."DESCRIPTION"                         AS "MaterialGroupName",
    "MATERIAL_MASTER"."PRIMARY_UOM_CODE"                               AS "StockKeepingUnit",
    CAST("MATERIAL_MASTER"."SEGMENT1" AS VARCHAR(255))                 AS "MaterialNumber"
FROM "CTE_MATERIAL_MASTER" AS "MATERIAL_MASTER"
    LEFT JOIN "MTL_ITEM_CATALOG_GROUPS_B" AS "MTL_ITEM_CATALOG_GROUPS_B"
        ON "MATERIAL_MASTER"."ITEM_CATALOG_GROUP_ID" = "MTL_ITEM_CATALOG_GROUPS_B"."ITEM_CATALOG_GROUP_ID"
    LEFT JOIN "MTL_ITEM_CATALOG_GROUPS_TL" AS "MTL_ITEM_CATALOG_GROUPS_TL"
        ON "MTL_ITEM_CATALOG_GROUPS_B"."ITEM_CATALOG_GROUP_ID" = "MTL_ITEM_CATALOG_GROUPS_TL"."ITEM_CATALOG_GROUP_ID"
        AND "MTL_ITEM_CATALOG_GROUPS_TL"."LANGUAGE" = <%=LanguageKey%>
WHERE "MATERIAL_MASTER"."RN" = 1
